title: Bug 114470: Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When trying to use the value 'new Date("3/2/2005")' in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the value 'new Date("3/2/2005")' in a table filter, an error message is displayed on the report page: There are error(s) in Table : table8Error0 : data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))detail : An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.
EB: When using the value 'new Date("3/2/2005")' in a table filter, the filter should work without any errors being thrown.
SR:
1. Open the table filter.
2. Enter the value 'new Date("3/2/2005")'.
3. Save and preview the report.
4. Verify that the table filter works correctly without any errors being displayed.
